block.name: list_bucket

extended_input_schema.hint: Choose the folder path to monitor. Leave it blank if all files/objects are to be monitored.
extended_input_schema.label: Folder
extended_input_schema.name: prefix

toggle_field.name: prefix
toggle_field.label: Folder name
toggle_field.hint: Enter the path to monitor. Specify a folder or sub-folder path with a “/” at the end. For ex. folder/subfolder1/.

extended_input_schema.hint: Select this option if you wish to monitor files/objects of sub-folders present in the source folder. Defaults to No if Restrict to Path is specified in connection. Otherwise, defaults to Yes.
extended_input_schema.label: Include Sub-Folders?
extended_input_schema.name: include_subfolders

extended_input_schema.hint: Set maximum number of objects to be retrieved. If left unspecified, this value defaults to 1000. Maximum allowed size is 1000.
extended_input_schema.label: Response size
extended_input_schema.name: max_keys

extended_input_schema.hint: Set this to any key in the specified bucket. Only objects after this key will be returned in the response. Note that for objects within sub-folders, the key value should include the path from the bucket root. For example, if Folder input is set to test_dir/inner_dir/, then this value should be set to test_dir/inner_dir/
extended_input_schema.label: Start after
extended_input_schema.name: start_after

extended_input_schema.hint: Set this field to Yes to retrieve the owner information for each object in the response. Defaults to No.
extended_input_schema.label: Fetch owner?
extended_input_schema.name: fetch_owner

toggle_field.name: fetch_owner
toggle_field.label: Fetch owner?
toggle_field.hint: Set this field to true to retrieve the owner info for each object in the response. Defaults to false.

extended_input_schema.hint: Specify the Next page token from the output of a previous List files in bucket action to retrieve the next set of objects.
extended_input_schema.label: Next page token
extended_input_schema.name: continuation_token
